original: Āsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavam hetum dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Noāsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: noāsavam hetum dhammam paṭicca na noāsavaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Āsavaṁ hetuñca noāsavaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsavam hetuñca noāsavam hetuñca dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Noāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: noāsavam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na noāsavaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca
